sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均含"邻近，附近"之意。
means: neighbourbood ： 指邻居或同居住者接近的地方，也指街坊四邻或居民点。
vicinity ： 侧重指距说话人很近的地方。

sentence.Network_en: Only a handful had returned to work in the immediate vicinity.
sentence.Network_cn: 仅有几个人回到临近地区工作。

sentence.Network_en: Crowds gathered in the vicinity of Trafalgar Square.
sentence.Network_cn: 成群结队的人聚集在特拉法尔加广场周围。

sentence.Network_en: He told us there was no hotel in the vicinity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他告诉我们说附近没有旅馆.

考博英语词汇 ... vice verse 反过来(也是这样) vicinity n. 附近，邻近 vicious a. 邪恶的，不道德的;恶意的，恶毒的；.
新概念第三册精解 ... ●hostile adj. 不友好的,有敌意的 ●vicinity n. 周围,近邻 ●architectural adj. 建筑的.
大学英语六级词汇 v_在线英语听力室 ... verse n.诗体(作品)；诗节，诗句 vicinity n.邻近；附近地区 visa n.(护照等的)签证.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'proximity'): from Latin vicinitas, from vicinus 'neighbour'

entry.def: If something is in the vicinity of a particular place, it is near it.

example.ex: There were a hundred or so hotels in the vicinity of the railway station...
example.tran: 在火车站附近大约有100家旅馆。

example.ex: The police roadblocks are still in place and the immediate vicinity of the house remains cordoned off.
example.tran: 警察设置的路障还在，房子四周仍然用警戒线隔离着。

sentences.sentence: "the plane crashed in the vicinity of Asheville"
"he always blames someone else in the immediate neighborhood"
"I will drop in on you the next time I am in this neck of the woods"

auth_sentence.content: A ship in the vicinity that could help.
auth_sentence.res_content: A ship in the vicinity that could help.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A ship in the vicinity that could help.

auth_sentence.content: It grows fast and destroys most other plants in its vicinity.
auth_sentence.res_content: It grows fast and destroys most other plants in its vicinity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It grows fast and destroys most other plants in its vicinity.

auth_sentence.content: An ex-farmer from the vicinity of Miastoko, in the far north.
auth_sentence.res_content: An ex-farmer from the vicinity of Miastoko, in the far north.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An ex-farmer from the vicinity of Miastoko, in the far north.

sentences.en: He told us there was no hotel in the vicinity.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我们说附近没有旅馆。

jushi.english: He is in the vicinity of 60.
There is no hotel in the vicinity.
